Comment: I agree 99%, but I don't like your last line for annoying reasons.  It is important to note that real world forces make this "perfect monarch" thing impossible because of how power is wielded by people. Even great monarchs struggled to keep their corrupt nobles in check.  The problem is that these MAGA folks don't recognize the real world dissonance of these ideas. You are daring them to go find a perfect person to serve as our perfect monarch. Well, they actually did set out to find their perfect monarch, _and they found one._ Reality denied them the answers they were looking for (because it doesn't exist), so they simply retreated into delusion to project perfection onto some vessel.  They found the nearest spray tanned turd with a big mouth, and then dropped to their knees to worship him. It's a pathetic display of small minded people. Needless to say, their solution is melting in the face of reality, and they're flailing to figure out whose fault it is. Not theirs of course; it's never their fault.  At the heart of all this recent strongman macho bullshit culture are small minded cowards that can't fathom their own failures.
